main event: A bright white ball with a tail observed at Zaragoza Air Base, Spain on August 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object was formed and very bright white with a tail that had orange or red sparkles., The observation lasted for about 10 minutes., No sound or exhaust was noted during the sighting., The object's disappearance was instantaneous., The conclusion was that the sighting was probably caused by a meteor.
sighted object: one bright white ball with a tail
witness description: air control tower operators at Zaragoza Air Base
